groups.name: All Groups
groups.description: General resources available to all groups

groups.name: Homeless Individuals
groups.description: Emergency shelter, transitional housing, mental health services, employment programs

groups.name: Families
groups.description: Support services for families including childcare, parenting resources, and family counseling

groups.name: Veterans
groups.description: Housing, mental health services, job placement, and benefits navigation for veterans

groups.name: Tribal
groups.description: Resources specifically for Native American and tribal communities

groups.name: Low-Income Individuals/Families
groups.description: Food security, utility assistance, job training, affordable housing, and financial literacy

groups.name: Domestic Violence Survivors
groups.description: Emergency shelter, legal aid, counseling, childcare, and safety planning

groups.name: Seniors
groups.description: Healthcare access, meal delivery, transportation, and elder abuse prevention

groups.name: Youth (At-Risk)
groups.description: After-school programs, tutoring, mentorship, foster care support, and vocational training

groups.name: Mental Health/Substance Abuse
groups.description: Counseling, rehabilitation programs, peer support groups, and crisis hotlines

groups.name: Immigrants/Refugees
groups.description: Legal aid, language classes, cultural integration, and employment assistance
